attributes.action: Recognise Tony Foulds for tending the US war memorial with an honour.
attributes.background:
Tony Foulds has dedicated his life to honouring the memory of 10 US airmen who died when their aircraft came down in front of him.

He should be given an honour such as an OBE or MBE for his selfless public service on the Queens birthday honours

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
